name: Github Org Invite
description: A simple Nuxt app to send automatic invites to GitHub Organizations (and teams)!

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: [REQUIRED] A Github access token to activate the Octokit GitHub Client

ORG_NAME.description: [REQUIRED] The organization to which you would like to invite users. Yon can confirm it by going to your org's dashboard : "https://github.com/orgs/{ORG_NAME}/dashboard"

BASE_URL.description: [REQUIRED] The URL at which your web app is hosted. Eg: "https://invite-to-org.herokuapp.com"

TEAM_NAME.description: [OPTIONAL] Set default team to join. You can confirm it by going to your team's page at "https://github.com/orgs/{ORG_NAME}/teams/{TEAM_NAME}"

BACKGROUND_COLOR.description: [OPTIONAL] Background color for front page. Can be any hex color code. Default is #14274E

ACCENT_COLOR.description: [OPTIONAL] Accent color for the Landing page. Can be any hex color code. Default is #394867
